RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 82. Claiming Purse 13600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since August 2, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Pr ice $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HONEYBELL good position to far turn rallied along outside dueled to prevail. CARIBBEAN NIGHT no speed to far turn, rallied on outside too late, best of rest. RIBALDRY (IRE) speed to the front, stayed clear to the stretch weakened for show. CONNECTTHECAUSEWAY no speed to far turn, rallied between horses stretch to move up. SILVER SEA saved ground, shuffled back at the half, no menaced thereafter. CELESTIAL SPIN unhurried early, outside run to far turn, could not sustain bid. MAMBO KITTEN tried to keep up form inside to far turn, nothing left faded back. GRAN CHEMIN chased pace to the with a steady fade thereafter.

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Sea
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, shuffled back at the half, no menaced thereafter

ENTRY.NAME: Caribbean Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, rallied on outside too late, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Celestial Spin
ENTRY.OWNER: Fattore Robert Munster Sean and Cristel Mark J
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, outside run to far turn, could not sustain bid

ENTRY.NAME: Connectthecauseway
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, rallied between horses stretch to move up

ENTRY.NAME: Ribaldry (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, stayed clear to the stretch weakened for show

ENTRY.NAME: Mambo Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up form inside to far turn, nothing left faded back

ENTRY.NAME: Honeybell
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to far turn rallied along outside dueled to prevail

ENTRY.NAME: Gran Chemin
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to the with a steady fade thereafter

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 89. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MARCH 2, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON FOUR RACES IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAROM loped along on the lead, never pressured, drew off tons the best. ZERO TO ONEHUNDRED chased winner throughout, never a threat while clearly, best rest. SAVING MAMA between horses first turn three wide, raced along evenly for show. BRODYTHEOXMAN close up to the half with a steady fade in the stretch run. BIG BOSS MAN off rail run backstretch, never in the hunt.

ENTRY.NAME: Carom
ENTRY.OWNER: Molumby John and Susan Anderson LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: loped along on the lead, never pressured, drew off tons the best

ENTRY.NAME: Zero to Onehundred
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner throughout, never a threat while clearly, best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Saving Mama
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses first turn three wide, raced along evenly for show

ENTRY.NAME: Brodytheoxman
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up to the half with a steady fade in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Big Boss Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run backstretch, never in the hunt

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 52. Maiden Claiming Purse 9000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LITTLE MIAMI chased leader to the stretch, roused to run past and cleared off on the wrong lead in the final furlong to clear. AWESOME MARINA raced back to the turnoff rail run in the stretch for place spot. WILL VIRGINIA DARE bit tardy from gate, went up inside to the lead, weakened in the stretch, Race three was hand timed.

ENTRY.NAME: Will Virginia Dare
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tardy from gate, went up inside to the lead, weakened stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Little Miami
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to the stretch, roused to run past, cleared off

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Marina
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back to the turnoff rail run in the stretch for place spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 9100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 2, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VAMONOS speed to duel from two path switched inside for the stretch run while along in time. FAST ROY just off leaders to the turn, took over into stretch, outdueled. FROOME (IRE) off rail chase to quarter pole, ran on in the stretch for show. COMMANDER COMPTON broke bit tardy, raced back to the stretch with mild improvement. JAHEZ inside trip with no response when needed. VAMOS ANTONIO brief speed inside to turn, gave way readily. Race four was hand timed.

ENTRY.NAME: Jahez
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Commander Compton
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke bit tardy, raced back to the stretch with mild improvement

ENTRY.NAME: Vamos Antonio
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed inside to turn, gave way readily

ENTRY.NAME: Vamonos
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to duel from two path switched inside stretch in time

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Fred W. Hertrich lll & John D. Fielding

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Roy
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off leaders to the turn, took over into stretch, outdueled

ENTRY.NAME: Froome (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail chase to quarter pole, ran on in the stretch for show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1 1/16M Turf CR: 76. Claiming Purse 13600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 2, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Ho rses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ELIZA'S HONOR good position to the half, took over to stay clear to the wire. SOME R BLESSED raced back to the half, launched bid far turn, on for place spot. LEMONADEATTHELATCH secured inside to far turn, ran on in the stretch for third. SILVESTRE raced back to far turn with a bid in the stretch to improve late. BIG HELLO raced back to the stretch while improving in the late going. KICK ROCKS KID speed to the front dueled early, stayed to far turn, weakened. YES POINT good position never far back to far turn, dropped back while even. COUSIN ODELL dueled, chased to far turn, folded in the stretch run. DOM GERVASIO good position to far turn with a steady fade back. MR. CUNNINGHAM tracking leaders to far turn off rail, gave way badly in stretch. MORE CHANCES raced back to far turn, took a bad step and stumbled with the rider losing his iron and dropping far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Dom Gervasio
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to far turn with a steady fade back

ENTRY.NAME: Cousin Odell
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, chased to far turn, folded in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Eliza's Honor
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to the half, took over to stay clear to the wire

ENTRY.NAME: Kick Rocks Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front dueled early, stayed to far turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Lemonadeatthelatch
ENTRY.COMMENT: secured inside to far turn, ran on in the stretch for third

ENTRY.NAME: Yes Point
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position never far back to far turn, dropped back while even

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Cunningham
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracking leaders to far turn off rail, gave way badly in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: More Chances
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back to far turn, took a bad step , rider lost his irons

ENTRY.NAME: Some R Blessed
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back to the half, launched bid far turn, on for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Big Hello
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back to the stretch while improving in the late going

ENTRY.NAME: Silvestre
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back to far turn with a bid in the stretch to improve late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 79. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 14400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $10,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since A ugust 2, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000) .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MEMPHIS CASH QUEEN trailed to the turn, rallied on in earnest while outside to clear off in the final seventy yards. PELLETIER tracked leader to the half, took into far turn, outkicked to wire. BELLE OF ST. JOHN inside speed to the turn, weakened in the stretch for show spot. MORNING LINE NEWS outside run first turn in hand, with no response when needed. AUNT RUTH raced along evenly to far turn with nothing left and faded back.

ENTRY.NAME: Belle of St. John
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the turn, weakened in the stretch for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Pelletier
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader to the half, took into far turn, outkicked to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Memphis Cash Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to the turn, rallied on in earnest outside to clear off

ENTRY.NAME: Aunt Ruth
ENTRY.OWNER: Riley Barbara Ouzts Toni and Mattingly David H
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly to far turn with nothing left and faded back

ENTRY.NAME: Morning Line News
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside run first turn in hand, with no response when needed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FEELING IT lagged back to far turn with a run into the stretch to go clear. TOMAHAWK KITTEN broke awkward, all out run from quarter pole for place. CAPPY HOUR speed between horses into first turn, dueled inside, settled show. EMPEROR'S GOLD chased top pair from inside to half while grinding away stretch. MIDNIGHT BLUE NOTE raced evenly throughout with no late response when needed. BAKER'S MAN raced far back at all calls. FULCO dueled from two path to far turn, led into stretch, stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Emperor's Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair from inside to half while grinding away stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Tomahawk Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke awkward, all out run from quarter pole for place

ENTRY.NAME: Cappy Hour
ENTRY.OWNER: Adams James M and Cox Christopher J
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed between horses into first turn, dueled inside, settled show

ENTRY.NAME: Fulco
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled from two path to far turn, led into stretch, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Blue Note
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced evenly throughout with no late response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Baker's Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced far back at all calls

ENTRY.NAME: Feeling It
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged back to far turn with a run into the stretch to go clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Martha Jane Mulholland, John HenryMulholland & Tom Grether

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1 1/16M Turf CR: 92. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 17800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Ove r Since August 2, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $15,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROGUE ELEMENT rated kindly while tracking trio of foes to the far turn with a steady run up the inside past quarter pole, angled out while full of run to go well clear in the stretch with a solid effort.. BOISE raced along evenly to far turn, ran on steadily for place spot. P K WOOD good position never far back throughout, raced along in the stretch run for show spot. FIXITWITHFORWARD was squeezed at the start, raced along evenly from inside to far turn and improved position late. SMOKEY LEE leaned in a bit from the gate, dueled for a half to quarter pole, tried hard in the lane but weakened in the final furlong. ON PALM SUNDAY stuttered at the start with no speed throughout while never a menace. DRIFTWOOD brief duel with a steady fade stopping badly. BASTIEN LE BROWN never menaced. MAGNA RULER broke in at the start, dueled with good speed to the half from inside, gave way readily in the stretch run. Race was hand timed.

ENTRY.NAME: On Palm Sunday
ENTRY.COMMENT: stuttered start, no speed throughout while never a menace

ENTRY.NAME: P K Wood
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position never far back throughout, raced along for show

ENTRY.NAME: Smokey Lee
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled half to quarter pole, tried hard in the lane but weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Fixitwithforward
ENTRY.COMMENT: squeezed start evenly from inside turn, improved position late

ENTRY.NAME: Magna Ruler
ENTRY.OWNER: Oldfield Carolyn and Ramos Juan O
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, dueled with good speed to far turn, gave way in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Boise
ENTRY.OWNER: Allen Jeff W Thomas Michael and Weiter Joseph A
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly, split horses into the stretch, coming on

ENTRY.NAME: Driftwood
ENTRY.OWNER: O'Hara, Jr., Robert and Gower, Gwyneth
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief duel three wide first turn angled four wide into stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Bastien Le Brown
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Rogue Element
ENTRY.COMMENT: steady inside run to far turn, angled out full of run, cleared

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: G. Watts Humphrey Jr. & W. S. Farish
